title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character in the first line is replaced with spaces so that both lines are visually indented the same, and then the ShiftLeft action is executed, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the first space character (i.e., the tab should be removed). However, in the current scenario, the text is not shifting left correctly. It is also unclear how this behavior is specified. Additionally, if there is a stray space, it becomes even more confusing as to why the text won't shift.
SR:
1. Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that both lines are visually indented the same.
2. Execute the ShiftLeft action.
3. Verify that the second line is shifted left and the first line is shifted left at least to the first space character (i.e., the tab is removed).
